name: The Loop (EnverArco)
description:
WASD or ARROW KEYS to move, SPACE to jump. Press TAB to end your current loop. Press R to restart the current level.

The timer starts once you move the robot. Each robot lasts 20 seconds and its movements will be recorded. When one robots loop ends another begins and you’ll see your previous robot loops play out.

Reach the red emblem to advance to the next level. Beware: Colliding with your loops will change the past and thus the future!

Scoring: Time left + 15x loops left + 10x collectibles
